title: Alquiler de ático en Pascual Ribot, 1
description:
Flat / Apartment for rent in Plaza Madrid

You don’t need to stay a long time, you can keep the months you need.

It is rented with furniture. Ready to move into.

Fantastic apartment in the center of Palma, one minute walk from Sa Riera and Santa Catalina.

Its 86 square meters are very well distributed with a spacious living room and impeccably decorated as well as the other rooms. The available kitchen is completely renovated and equipped with oven, fridge and extractor hood. It has two bedrooms, one double and one single, the both with a wardrobe.

Without neighbors on the same floor.

The building is very central and well connected with buses (2, 6, 7, 8 among other lines 5, 41). A few steps away you will find a supermarket, restaurants, all kinds of shops and Avenida Jaime III, Paseo Mallorca or Santa Catalina several of the areas that make up the typhical urban areas of the city.

Characteristics:

- 86 m2

- 2 Bedrooms

- 1 Bathroom

- Open Kitchen

- Spacious Living room

- Instalationof air conditioning, cold and heat.

- Elevator

- Natural light

Comunity fee included

1450€ deposit.

Pets not allowed

Contract for the time you need.
